overview: Porn parody of 'Interview with the Vampire'.  Forever Yours Imagine what it would be like to be alive forever. To never grow old. . . to be forever young, forever hard, forever ready. To have a life full of unimaginable erotic sensations. . . to have any woman you want, whenever you want her, in any way you please. To make love to an endless array of beautiful, willing women forever and ever. Is it a dream? A fantasy? It's all this and more. . . he's here.
title: Intercourse with the Vampire
